ThingDef.label: M16A4 MWS
ThingDef.description: A very common assault rifle design, fitted with a close-range optic. Long-ranged, but limited to three-round bursts.

ThingDef.label: M4A1
ThingDef.description: A widespread carbine design fitted with a retractable stock.

ThingDef.label: M4A1 Block I
ThingDef.description: A widespread carbine design fitted with a retractable stock. Fitted with a close-range optic.

ThingDef.label: M4A1 Block I custom
ThingDef.description: A widespread carbine design fitted with a retractable stock. Fitted with a close-range optic and a suppressor.

ThingDef.label: Mk18 Mod 1
ThingDef.description: A very cut down carbine fitted with a holo sight, intended for close quarters combat.

ThingDef.label: Mk18 Mod 1 custom
ThingDef.description: A Mk18 carbine which has been equipped with a drum magazine and a close-range optic.

ThingDef.label: UDMC F5-PVAR
ThingDef.description: An extremely compact carbine designed with a unique internal mechanism which helps to reduce recoil. Fitted with a retractable stock and a red dot sight.

ThingDef.label: SIG MCX Rattler
ThingDef.description: A compact PDW based on the AR-15 design, chambered for .300 Blackout. Fitted with a reflex-sight.

ThingDef.label: SIG MCX Rattler Canebrake
ThingDef.description: A compact PDW based on the AR-15 design, chambered for .300 Blackout. Fitted with a reflex-sight.

ThingDef.label: XM8
ThingDef.description: A long forgotten carbine design fitted with a retractable stock and an integrated reflex sight.

ThingDef.label: M2 Carbine
ThingDef.description: A lightweight automatic rifle firing an early intermediate cartridge. Primitive and low range, but still quite deadly.

ThingDef.label: K2C
ThingDef.description: A compact carbine fitted with a red dot optic. Has a foldable stock to reduce bulk.

ThingDef.label: Galil ACE-N 22
ThingDef.description: A widespread carbine design fitted with a retractable stock.

ThingDef.label: AC-556
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic carbine, fitted with a bayonet. Features a foldable stock to reduce bulk.

ThingDef.label: Strike Industries AR-15
ThingDef.description: A highly customized AR-15 styled rifle, fitted with an LPVO scope.

ThingDef.label: M27 IAR
ThingDef.description: An automatic rifle made for long range suppresive fire while being lighter than a typical LMG.

ThingDef.label: Mk16
ThingDef.description: A spec-ops combat assault rifle firing an intermediate rifle cartridge. Also known as the SCAR-L.

ThingDef.label: SCAR 16S
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic rifle firing an intermediate cartridge. created for the civilian market.

ThingDef.label: AK-47
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern assault rifle, generally considered to be simple and reliable. Even now, it remains the most widespread firearm platform ever made.

ThingDef.label: AK-47 (Gold)
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern assault rifle, generally considered to be simple and reliable. Even now, it remains the most widespread firearm platform ever made. This one has been gold-plated.

ThingDef.label: AK-103
ThingDef.description: A rugged assault rifle design which features a side-folding stock and a large muzzle brake which greatly reduces recoil.

ThingDef.label: AK-103 Redwood
ThingDef.description: A rugged assault rifle design which features a large muzzle brake to greatly reduce recoil.

ThingDef.label: AK-200
ThingDef.description: Highly modernized variant of an ancient assault rifle design. Features a side-folding stock, a flash-hider which helps reduce recoil, and a close-range optic.

ThingDef.label: AK-205
ThingDef.description: Highly modernized carbine variant of an ancient assault rifle design. Features a side-folding stock, a flash-hider which helps reduce recoil, and a close-range optic.

ThingDef.label: Zastava M70B1
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern assault rifle, generally considered to be simple and reliable.

ThingDef.label: Zastava M70AB2
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern assault rifle, generally considered to be simple and reliable. Has a folding stock for bulk reduction.

ThingDef.label: K2C1
ThingDef.description: An assault rifle, intended for jungle combat. Has a foldable stock to reduce bulk.

ThingDef.label: QBZ-95
ThingDef.description: A compact bullpup assault rifle, chambered for an intermediate rifle cartridge. It is relatively easy to handle.

ThingDef.label: QBZ-191
ThingDef.description: An advanced modern assault rifle design, fitted with an advanced digital scope with night vision capabilities. Features a grip pod for stable shots.

ThingDef.label: QBZ-192
ThingDef.description: An advanced modern carbine design, fitted with a laser light and a reflex sight.

ThingDef.label: QBU-191
ThingDef.description: Select-fire designated marksman rifle, it is fairly compact and lightweight while still being decently accurate at long range. Fitted with a laser for emergency close-quarters situations.

ThingDef.label: VHS-D2 CT
ThingDef.description: A bullpup assault rifle with an integrated reflex sight. Compact and impressively accurate at long range.

ThingDef.label: L85A3
ThingDef.description: A bullpup assault rifle fitted with an advanced electronic scope. Lightweight, highly compact, and exceptionally accurate in both long and short range combat.

ThingDef.label: AUG A1
ThingDef.description: A bullpup assault rifle fitted with an integrated magnified optic. Lightweight, highly compact, and exceptionally accurate in both long and short range combat.

ThingDef.label: AUG A3
ThingDef.description: A bullpup assault rifle fitted with a set of close-range optics. Lightweight, highly compact, and exceptionally accurate in both long and short range combat.

ThingDef.label: AUG A3 SA
ThingDef.description: A bullpup semi-automatic rifle fitted with a magnified optic. Lightweight, highly compact, and exceptionally accurate in both long and short range combat.

ThingDef.label: G11 K2
ThingDef.description: A rare bullpup assault rifle chambered for special caseless ammunition. Very lightweight, its unique design allows it to hold up to 50 rounds in the magazine. Can utilize a three-round "hyperburst" feature to increase hit probability.

ThingDef.label: Mk17 Mod 0
ThingDef.description: A spec-ops combat assault rifle firing a full-sized rifle cartridge. Also known as the SCAR-H.

ThingDef.label: Mk17 LB
ThingDef.description: A highly customized DMR, capable of full-auto fire if necessary and fitted with a laser for emergency close-quarters engagements.

ThingDef.label: SCAR 17S
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic rifle firing a full-sized cartridge. created for the civilian market.

ThingDef.label: SCAR 17S (Patriot)
ThingDef.description: A highly customized SCAR 17S, converted for full-auto fire and fitted with an LPVO.

ThingDef.label: Zastava M77 B1
ThingDef.description: A rifle based on the AK platform but chambered for a full-sized cartridge.

ThingDef.label: SA-58 IBR
ThingDef.description: A compact battle rifle with a folding stock. It is very effective at mid to long ranges.

ThingDef.label: SA-58 IBR Tactical
ThingDef.description: A highly modified variant of an ancient battle rifle design. Its folding stock helps to greatly reduce bulk, which allows it to use a suppressor while remaining relatively compact. Comes fitted with an advanced set of optics, designed to make it easy to switch between long and short range combat.

ThingDef.label: XCR-M
ThingDef.description: A compact rifle firing a heavy magnum cartridge. Very lethal, but short ranged. Features a folding-stock to reduce bulk.

ThingDef.label: XCR-M Tactical
ThingDef.description: A compact rifle firing a heavy magnum cartridge. Very lethal, but relatively short ranged. Features a folding-stock to reduce bulk. Comes fitted with an advanced set of optics, designed to make it easy to switch between long and short range combat.

ThingDef.label: M7 NGSW
ThingDef.description: High-performance military battle rifle, chambered for .277 Fury. Comes equipped with an advanced scope and a suppressor.

ThingDef.label: M7 Assaulter
ThingDef.description: High-performance military carbine, chambered for .277 Fury. Comes equipped with a reflex sight and a suppressor.
